CHAT.comment: the start of the recording June and her mother are playing on the floor with a soft toy duck.

u.a: mother holds up a different toy duck , June looks at it .
period of extensive cooing by June , silence .
mother teases June with the toy .
silence , mother holds up an overshoe .
mother picks up the other shoe .
mother picks up a toy rabbit .
June is playing with the shoes .
June hands a shoe to her mother .
mother gives June an old bunch of keys .
mother holds up the rubber duck
mother puts an ear in Mr Potatohead .
mother picking up other parts and putting them on Mr Potatohead .
mother lifts out a toy ladybug from the toybox .
mother fails to locate the missing shoe for the Mr Potatohead .
mother holds Mr Potatohead out to June , June takes the Mr Potatohead .
June grabs Mr Potatohead by the ear .
mother is raking in the toybox and doesn't respond , mother turns June round to face the camera .
June removes the nose from the Mr Potatohead and takes it to her mother .
mother puts the nose on June's nose .
June picks up the toy telephone .
June hands the phone to her mother .
mother holds the phone out to June .
June turns her back to her mother .
mother picks a book out of the toybox .
June now has her back to the camera .
June gets off her mother's knee and wanders over to the camera .
no response , mother holds up a soft toy chicken .
June picks up a book of animals and hands it to her mother .
mother pats her knee , June walks over to her mother .
June sits on her mother's knee .
June turns the last page of the book .
June drops the book and picks up the bathtime book .
June hands the book to her mother .
June stands up , mother holds up the book .
June stands and begins to wander around .
mother holds up a toy ladybug .
June turns back to her mother and knocks the bug out of her hands .
mother holds up a toy train .
June wanders over towards the camera .
June tries to get past the camera , mother digs in the toybox and picks out the pieces of a pull apart train .
June starts digging in the toybox .
silence , mother still looking for the piece .
June has put two pieces together .
mother hands another piece to June .
June has her back to the camera .
June is still putting the pieces together .
mother attempts to turn June around , June cries .
mother hands the last piece to June .
silence during which June dismantles the train and mother fixes up the Mr Potatohead .
silence during which June plays with the train pieces .
silence during which mother assembles the train .
silence during which June tries to disassemble the train until she becomes frustrated and cries . mother takes the first piece off the train .
silence during which June succeeds in dismantling the train .
mother has a jigsaw in her hands , June goes over to her mother .
mother moves June to face the camera .
referencing a piece of the jigsaw .
June picks up Mr Potatohead's hat and puts it on her own head .
mother puts the jigsaw in front of June and they begin to play with it .
it is the book about the train .
June holds the book out to her mother .
June wanders over and begins to play with the microphone .
June hands a piece of the puzzle to her mother .
mother reaches for the base board of the puzzle .
June dumps the board , mother reaches for it .
June picks up an old card .
June holds the card out to her mother .
June wanders away and then hands the card to her mother .
June holds a cup up to her mother's mouth .
June holds the cup up again .
June holds the cup up again .
mother holds the card in front of June .
mother and child return to the jigsaw .
silence during which they work the puzzle , June holds out two pieces of the puzzle .
June picks up a piece of the puzzle .
June gets hold of the pendant on her mother's necklace .
June lets go of the pendant .
June picks up the animal book .
points to the picture and touches it
mother picks up a wooden car .
silence , mother playing with the car .
June looking at jigsaw and poking it .
mother moves jigsaw closer to June , June picks up a piece of the puzzle .
silence during which June stands and looks at the camera , mother gets Mr Potatohead .
mother attempts to move June so that she faces the camera , June is having a problem with Mr Potatohead .
mother tries to turn June again .
silence during which reassembles Mr Potatohead .
June moves the hat to the mouth hole .
June tries to put the hat on the Mr Potatohead .
June puts the hat in the mouth hole again .
mother hands her the lips and the pipe .
silence during which June moves the offending hat around various holes .
mother pops the pipe and lips into the mouth hole .
June hands an ear to her mother .
mother hands the other ear to June and June tries to put it in .
June still trying to place the ear .
silence , June hands the ear back to her mother .
mother takes the Mr Potatohead and puts the ear back .
mother tries to put the hat on but June brushes her hand aside .
silence , June pulls every part off the Mr Potatohead .
silence during which June successively removes the shoes and then replaces them .
June removes the mouth and cries .
June dumps the Mr Potatohead and stands with a cloth book in her hand .
June wraps Mr Potatohead in the cloth book .
June picks up the book about trains .
mother turns June towards the camera , June turns back away from it .
mother puts the book in front of June .
June picks the book up , hands it to her mother and then turns away again .
June holds the book out to her mother and turns away a second time .
June turns and sees her mother's pendant
June looks back at the book .
mother picks up the missing piece from the jigsaw .
June lifts out a piece of the puzzle .
June tries but the shape is disoriented .
June sits on the puzzle and hands the piece to her mother .
June puts her hand on the train book .
June reaches out and touches the microphone . silence .
June stands up and goes to play with the microphone .
June puts the pipe in the mouth hole without the lips .
mother removes the pipe and picks up the mouth .
mother puts in the lips , then the pipe and then shows the completed Mr Potatohead to June .
silence , June looks in the toybox and pulls out a plastic glove puppet .
silence during which June plays with the puppet .
June tosses the puppet away again .
June picks up her bottle of juice and drinks .
June gets the bottle and drinks again .
silence during which mother picks up the shapesorter , tips out all the shapes and begins putting them through the holes , June picks up a shape .
silence during which June drinks again , June begins to dismantle Mr Potatohead again , June removes the pipe .
June hands the mouth to her mother
June hands the Mr Potatohead to her mother
June holds the nose out close to her mother's nose .
June picks up a shape and tries to put it through a hole in the shapesorter .
June drops the shape on the floor and picks up another one , June tries the new shape .
June abandons the second shape and tries a third one .
June hands the shape to her mother .
June hands the shapesorter to her mother , mother looks at the side nearest to her .
mother lodges the shape in the correct hole .
June gets another shape and tries again , silence during which June drops the shape on the floor , picks it up and tries again .
mother offers her the correct shape for the hole she is working .
mother puts her finger through the correct hole .
June succeeds in dropping the shape through the hole .
June hands the shapesorter to her mother .
June tries all the other holes .
June eventually drops the shape through the correct hole .
June picks up another shape and tries it in a hole .
June exchanges the shape for a different one .
she tries the same hole and then hands the shape to her mother .
June picks up an empty cup .
June looks at the cup for a while and then holds it to her mother's mouth .
June puts the cup to her toy rabbit's mouth .

silence during which mother drops a shape through a hole and June picks up another one , she examines the new shape and then tries to put it through the wrong hole , mother points to the correct hole .
June ignores her mother's gesture and continues to try the shape in the wrong hole .
June hands the shape to her mother .
before her mother can get hold of the shape June pulls it away from her .
June gets up and looks in the toybox .
June pulls out a counting book .
even stress on both syllables and very high pitch .
June turns the page and closes the book , then she turns back to the front of the book .
June looks and points to the first page .
June looks closely at the lion .
June drops the book and gets the train book .
